akn:section.akn:heading: Honorable service requirement for award of military decorations

akn:content.akn:p: § 1136. Honorable service requirement for award of military decorations No military decoration, including a medal, cross, or bar, or an associated emblem or insignia, may be awarded or presented to any person, or to a representative of the person, if the service of the person after the person distinguished himself or herself has not been honorable. (Added Pub. L. 116–92, div. A, title V, § 582(a)(1), Dec. 20, 2019, 133 Stat. 1411.)
